themes: lack of transparency for non-traditional arts groups
racial and cultural inequity in funding
comparison to other cities' diversity in funding
key_phrases: be more transparent in your communication to artists outside of the 'traditional' (coded white) arts groups
language accessibility would also be key
our art community isn't as diverse in funding as cities like Houston and Dallas that elevate voices
the current funding numbers speak VOLUMES about this inequity
barriers_identified: lack of transparency for non-traditional arts groups
racial and cultural inequity in funding
solutions_proposed: increase transparency in communication to non-traditional arts groups
